deck: The Crimson Dragon Emperor, his spirit resides in Hyoudou Issei's Boosted Gear. His power is said to rival god's.
description:
Ddraig - one of the two legendary dragons feared by Angels, Fallen Angels, and Devils alike because his power rivals that of Gods and Satans.

He is known by different titles but most prominently as the Red Dragon Emperor and Welsh Dragon. He is sealed inside Hyoudou Issei's boosted gear.

Appearance

Ddraig is shown as a typical red dragon shown in most fiction and having green glowing eyes.

Personality

Before his sealing, Ddraig like a typical Dragon, proud and uncaring, when he fought Albion, the collateral damage was incalculable. He displayed a great deal of change when he partnered with Issei, displaying concern for his host. It can be speculated that he mellowed because of Issei's influence.

Power and Abilities

Little is known about Ddraig before he is sealed, but his power is so tremendous, the the warring groups, namely, the Devils, Fallen Angels, and Angels join together to stop him and Albion from fighting.

deck: A female Ex Nihili. She is seen more promenantly during the events of Infinity, and even aids the Avengers in stopping the Incursions.
description:
Origin

Ex Nihila is a female of the species known as the Ex Nihili. Not much is known about her origin, although it is highly likely she was created by the builders, just like other Ex Nihili. Therefore, it is very likely that Ex Nihila has lived for a very long time.

Creation

Ex Nihila was created by Jonathan Hickman, Jimmy Cheung and Leinil Francis Yu and first appeared in Infinity issue 1 (2013) although she appeared on the cover of Avengers Vol.5 issue 17 a month before her first appearance in comics.

Major Story Arcs

Infinity

Ex Nihila is one of the Ex Nihili whom are first ordered to follow the Builders in their quest to destroy unworthy planets, but later revolt against their former masters and become heroes. In this, Ex Nihila plays a vital role as she is often seen leading members of her species.

Everything Ends - The Incursions

Ex Nihila is seen with many other Ex Nihili, among others Ex Nihilo, in hoping to save a sun and with that a whole solar system. They fail, and soon learn of Abyss that the multiverse itself is on the brink of destruction. Ex Nihila and her fellow Ex Nihili's eventually decide to help the heroes of Earth in order to save the multiverse.

Powers and Abilities

Ex Nihila possesses powers and abilities similar to that of most Ex Nihili. Power and technology to transform the environments of entire planets and create new species. Ex Nihila is also able to shoot out energy blasts over a wide area and exhale fire. Ex Nihila possesses the ability to transform organic life, and has limited control over non sentient life, such as plants. Ex Nihila possesses superhuman levels of strength, and durability and is especially intelligent. Ex Nihilia possesses an extended physical longevity.

Physical Characteristics

  • Height: NA
  • Weight: NA
  • Hair: None
  • Eyes: Solid Green

deck: A diseased Xenomorph that was unable to develop past its larval stage. Despite this, it was still an incredibly dangerous creature and also secreted a devastatingly horrific disease that caused those infected by it to burst like balloons.
description:
Origin

While a couple of smugglers were raiding a ship that had been downed by an Alien Queen for some of her Xenomorph eggs, they came across a particular egg coated in some strange pink slime. Despite some misgivings, they took this egg with them as well and tried to sell it to their black market buyer. He wanted nothing do do with it however, as he was certain the egg was infected with some kind of contagion, and anything that was capable of infecting a Xenomorph seemed too dangerous to have around humans. The smugglers ignored their buyer's warnings though and instead tried to sell the egg on the planet Barabazon to a Penga bar owner they knew - a Penga bar being a place where people could try drug-like extraterrestrials powerful enough to make a man be willing to eat a piece of his own brain - for example. The owner tried to pawn the egg off to media personality Darryl Zither, only for the egg to hatch its Facehugger after Zither licked the egg for no sensible reason.

Stuck with the Facehugger on his face, Zither was taken home by his not-that-helpful bodyguards. When Zither awoke the following morning after the Facehugger had detached and died, he had no recollection of what had happened, and so he went off on his scheduled trip to the newly opened pleasure planet Celeste, along with its owner, Ivy Derringer. During the flight to Celeste however, the Alien embryo that had been implanted in Zither hatched, bursting from his chest and killing Ivy, after which it devoured both her and Zither. The Alien "Bodyburster" then killed the ship's pilot after the ship landed on Celeste and Ivy's quarters were opened. It then went on to explore the rest of Celeste, leaving its diseased slime trail wherever it went.

Creation

The Bodyburster was created by writers Justin Green and Jim Woodring, along with the artist Francisco Lopez. It first appeared in issue #2 of the 1998 Aliens: Kidnapped mini-series, although the diseased egg and Facehugger from which it was spawned appeared in the 1st issue. It served as the primary Xenomorph threat for the mini-series, although the 3rd issue still had an Alien Warrior on the cover despite it not making an appearance in the series.

Major Story Arc

Aliens: Kidnapped

The Bodyburster roamed the planet Celeste and killed indiscriminately: employees, guests, young, old, infirm, any and all that crossed its aimless path died brutally. Celeste security forces mobilized as soon as they discovered their first victim and their head officer declared martial law for the planet until the as of yet unidentified Xenomorph threat was eradicated. Government officials meanwhile were alerted to a lethal viral outbreak on Barabazon, as well as the fact that Darryl Zither was presumably impregnated with a Xenomorph that carried the virus, and that the Xenomorph was now loose on Celeste. Celeste's security forces were left in the dark regarding this matter, and simply focused on eliminating the Bodyburster. Following the trail of bodies and pink slime, the security forces finally tracked down the Bodyburster after it had single-handedly killed more than a dozen people. The Bodyburster was dead when they found it though, having apparently succumb to the disease it was infected with.

Despite its death, the Bodyburster's trail of carnage continued however, as its pink slime had long ago dried and gone airborne, spreading all over Celeste. Now faced with what was classified a Class Ten virus, the government was left with little choice to prevent the disease from spreading. Barabazon was nuked, followed by the entire planet of Celeste before people could even scarcely begin panicking when the virus started making many of them burst like blood-filled balloons.

The people the Bodyburster had killed on its own were quite honestly the lucky ones in the end.

Powers & Abilities

Being essentially a large chestburster, the Bodyburster lacks the long clawed limbs and bladed tail of a full-grown Xenomorph. It also didn't appear to possess to second, inner mouth typical of most Xenomorphs. Despite these short-comings, the Bodyburster is still dangerous, as it possesses small but sharp claws, a long tail it can wrap around victims, surprising speed and leaping capabilities, and a voracious appetite. The Bodyburster was shown to have devoured nearly a quarter of an entire person in only minutes. It's small size also makes the Bodyburster very stealthy, able to hide and slip through areas most other Xenomorphs wouldn't be able to fit in.

Most devastating of all though is the virus the Bodyburster carries. It secretes this virus as a pink slime wherever it goes, after which it will dry into powder and become airborne. Once infected, a person will start exhibiting erratic behavior and spout delusional nonsense, until finally they die brutally when their body literally bursts apart like a human balloon due to a massive over-production of blood, somewhat like a hyper-accelerated form of polycythemia.
name: Bodyburster

deck: The wacky ruler of Wacky World and preserver of the legacy of Uncle Mitch.
description:
History

Carny was a android, a automaton with human form. A short and fat human form. He was also an unofficial member of the robotic Extremists and the ruler of Wackyland, an amusement park created by Mitch Wacky, (a Walt Disney parody) of Angor and the last vestige of the civilization than once existed on the planet. It was never clarified if Carny ever was also the robotic version of a previously existent human Carny or if always was a robot designed by Mitch Wacky.

Carny had taken hostage the Silver Sorceress and the JLE after the Extremist attacked earth and sent them to the devastated Angor. But as a good robotic host, Carny was just delighted to have new visitors again, visitors to whom entertain. But after he revealed the true nature of the park and after the rejection of the leaguers to be entertained, Carny made the automatons attack the earthmen. However, the JLE just struck back and went after Carny. Terrified, Carny did the most wackiest thing he could: he destroyed the park and himself in the process. But that destruction woke up Mitch Wacky from his cryogenical suspension.

The head of Carny survived the explosions and was reactivated later by Wacky himself. There, Carny told him and the leaguers what happened after the death of the humans, how the automatons upgraded themselves and how they built heroes and villains so realistic than the villains believe themselves the real ones and destroyed the heroes, left Carny in charge of the park. This information was relevant to defeat the Extremists later on earth.

Countdown: Earth 8

Another version of Carny made a brief cameo as an inhabitant of Earth-8. He was the only one who opposed to some scheme to Lord Havok and was killed almost in the act. He looked more like a circus clown in this version.

Convergence: Batman & Robin.

Bring back in Convergence, a very fleshed Carny appeared as representative of Angor against the pre-Flashpoint Gotham City, defended by the team of Batman, Robin (Damian Wayne) Red Hood and Scarlet. Carny was leading the New Extremists: Death Angel, Brute and Meanstreak and using lethal gadgets to attack the caped crusaders, but their teamwork overcame the powers of Carny and their extremists team. It was presumed than he and their teammates were returned to their proper world/universes/timelines. Also, it wasn't clarified if this Carny was the original one or the robotic version.

Notes

As his colleagues Extremists, Carny is assumed to be a DC "homage" to some Marvel villain. By his relation to an amusement park is associated to x-villain Arcade.

description:
Asia Argento is a Nun/Sister Issei meet when strolling in town. She is an innocent and caring individual, always thinking of others before herself. She wields the divine sacred gear Twilight Healing which ca heal any injuries. She was excommunicated from the Church when they found out the she can also heal Devils and Fallen Angels.

Appearance

Around 15-16 years of age, Asia has long blonde hair and green eyes. Her hair flows all the way down to her back, with split bangs over her forehead and a single strand sticking out from the top, sloping backwards. Her main outfit consists of a dark teal nun outfit with light blue accents, a white veil over her head with light blue accents, a brown satchel slung on her right hip (where she holds her Bible), and brown boots with black straps in an X-shaped pattern. She also wears a silver cross necklace around her neck (she was later forced to remove it after becoming a Devil). Out of all the girls of the Occult Research Club, in terms of breast size, her breasts appear to be among the more "modest".

Upon transferring to Kuoh Academy, she wears the Kuoh Academy girls' uniform, albeit with a black sweater vest over her dress shirt in place of the cape and corset.

Personality

Asia is extremely innocent and fairly inexperienced in socializing and somewhat naive in the ways of the world. Even after being reincarnated as a Devil, Asia still believes in God and follows His teachings such as praying and reading the Bible, which would usually result in her getting severe headaches. Asia was also in deep shock when she learned that the God of the Bible was dead during the Kokabiel Incident.

Power and Abilities

Twilight Healing

The Sacred Gear Twilight Healing allows Asia to heal humans, Devils, Angels, and Fallen Angels alike. Asia herself shows no actual fighting technique, and mostly relies on her healing abilities. She can send the healing powers of Twilight Healing in a form of a projectile, but it is slightly inferior to her direct touch.

Generic Devil Powers

Her power that came from her from being turned into a Devil, though she does not use it.

  • Super Human Strength and Endurance
  • Enhance Senses
  • "Language" - ability to talk with any sentient being.

Story Arcs

The Red Dragon Emperor's Awakening

Asia first appeared as a Nun/Sister under the Fallen Angel Raynare, she summoned Asia with a plot to steal her Sacread Gear, Twilight Healing. Raynare succeeded in removing her Sacred Gear resulting in her untimely death, Rias revives her as a Devil under her as her Bishop. After the incident with Raynare, she stayed awhile in the Occult Research Club's Club House then moved to the Hyoudou Household afterwards. Asia also transferred to Kuoh Acadamy as a student and assigned in Issei's class.

After her move, she later goes to a mountain to train in preparation of the Rating Game between her master and her Riser Phenex. During the Rating Game, she stayed back at the headquarters with Rias due to her lack of combat abilities. She accompanies Rias when she goes to the enemy's headquarters, healing Rias while she is fighting Riser but gets knocked out by the shock of an attack of Riser's Queen with Issei shielding her. After Rias resigns from the match following Issei's defeat by Riser's hands, Asia spent 2 days trying to heal Issei but to no avail and was happy when he woke up. When Issei heads to the Underworld to rescue Rias, Asia wanted to follow him but was stopped by Issei. Asia, however makes Issei promise her that he will win and bring Rias back with him.

Video Games

High School DXD 3DS "Erotic Battle Adventure Game"

Publisher: Kadokawa Games

Release Date: November 2013

Platform: Nintendo 3DS

Retail Price: $ 63.00

Overview:

- The main objective of the game is to build up Lust and perform moves such as Dress Break.

The story centers around Hyoudou Issei, a dim-witted, lecherous second-year high school student who was killed Raynare on his first date . Issei (Yuuki Kaji) is reincarnated as a devil, and from that day forward, he serves as an underling of Rias Gremory (Yōko Hikasa), a high-level devil who is also the prettiest girl of Kuoh Academy as part of her peerage.

The game has a unique system, the player advances by following his desires. The game's story parts reenact the anime's plot, particularly, Issei's daily school life surrounded by girls. The player engages in conversations with the heroines and improves (or ruins) his standing among them by making choices. According to Famitsu, "the key to winning is 'lust'!"

In each chapter of the game, there are also battles with various opponents. The battles have a typical turn-based system in which the player selects commands. The player can use the "lust power" accumulated in the story parts to increase the "Dress Break" damage against opponents in battle.

Light Novel

High School DxD is a light novel written by Ichiei Ishibumi and illustrated by Miyama-Zero and published by Fujimi Shobo. It is a Supernatural (Dealing with the topic of Gods, Devils, Etc.) action anime which the story centers on Hyoudou Issei, a perverted high school student who is nearly killed by his first date, Yuuma Amano, who is later revealed as the Fallen Angel Raynare. He is soon saved by Rias Gremory, a crimson-haired beauty who reveals herself as a Devil and part of the Gremory Clan. He finds himself reborn as a Devil with the purpose of serving her.

The story focuses on the ongoing battle between the the Three Super Natural Faction:

  • Devils
  • Fallen Angels
  • Angels

description:
Akeno Himegami is a third year student of Kuoh Academy, she serves as the vice president of the Occult Research Club and serve as queen in Rias Gremory's peerage.

Together with Rias, they are known as the two great beauties of Kuoh Academy.

Appearance

Akeno, like Rias is in her late teens and also known as a buxom beauty. She has long flowing black hair reaching her legs and tied in a pony tail by a ribbon

Princess of Thunder Outfit

She commonly wears her Kuoh Academy Uniform even when fighting. When she needs to cast strong magic, she transform in her Princess of Lightning Outfit (Reference to Magical Girl Transformation).

Fallen Angel/Devil Form

In this form she grows three pairs of wings. Her outfit also changes, now wearing:

  • A very revealing set of armor consisting of a micro-bikini top, thong, thigh-high boots with garter belts, gauntlets, and amulet, all of which are black with gold accents with the boots and gauntlets featuring black feathers.
  • Her wings differ from a normal Fallen Angels, in which they are actually Devil's wings adorned with feathers as opposed to bird's wings.

Personality

Akeno is known to be clam, always smiling (perpetual smiler). She is playful and you can say that she have a sadistic side to her.

Power and Abilities

Stealth

A developed skill in which she can sneak behind people without leaving any presence. A devil has enhance sense, but she still can sneak behind them as testified by Rias.

Generic Devil Powers

- Her power that came from being transformed as a devil .

  • Super Human Strength and Endurance
  • Enhance Senses
  • "Language" - ability to talk with any sentient being.
  • Summoning

Magic

Holy Lightning

Lightning attack inherited from her father.

Story Arcs

The Red Dragon Emperor's Awakening

Akeno made her first appearance in Volume 1, introducing herself to Issei who just came to the Occult Research Club. She later assisted Rias in facing the Fallen Angels Dohnaseek, Kalawarner, and Mittelt, which they won after terminating the three.

She helps her master Rias in her Rating Game against her then fiancé, Riser Phenex, eliminating four members of Riser's peerage before facing Riser's Queen, Yubelluna, which she lost after the latter used the Phoenix Tears which replenish everything. She is later seen in Rias' engagement party, and helped Issei in his attempt to rescue Rias by knocking out the guards who were attempting to stop him.

Birth of the Breast Dragon Emperor

The Heroic Oppai Dragon

The Legend of Oppai Dragon and his Lively Companions

Trivia

  • Akeno's body measurements are B102-W60-H89 cm. (B40-W24-H35 in.) and her height is 168 cm. (5 feet 6 inches), and her weight is 54 kg. (119 lbs.), as revealed in the visual book with her data. Her breast size is recorded as the largest in the series.
  • Akeno' Birthday is July 21.

Media Appearance

Video Games

High School DXD 3DS "Erotic Battle Adventure Game"

Publisher: Kadokawa Games

Release Date: November 2013

Platform: Nintendo 3DS

Retail Price: $ 63.00

Overview:

- The main objective of the game is to build up Lust and perform moves such as Dress Break.

The story centers around Hyoudou Issei, a dim-witted, lecherous second-year high school student who was killed Raynare on his first date . Issei (Yuuki Kaji) is reincarnated as a devil, and from that day forward, he serves as an underling of Rias Gremory (Yōko Hikasa), a high-level devil who is also the prettiest girl of Kuoh Academy as part of her peerage.

The game has a unique system, the player advances by following his desires. The game's story parts reenact the anime's plot, particularly, Issei's daily school life surrounded by girls. The player engages in conversations with the heroines and improves (or ruins) his standing among them by making choices. According to Famitsu, "the key to winning is 'lust'!"

In each chapter of the game, there are also battles with various opponents. The battles have a typical turn-based system in which the player selects commands. The player can use the "lust power" accumulated in the story parts to increase the "Dress Break" damage against opponents in battle.

Light Novel

High School DxD is a light novel written by Ichiei Ishibumi and illustrated by Miyama-Zero and published by Fujimi Shobo. It is a Supernatural (Dealing with the topic of Gods, Devils, Etc.) action anime which the story centers on Hyoudou Issei, a perverted high school student who is nearly killed by his first date, Yuuma Amano, who is later revealed as the Fallen Angel Raynare. He is soon saved by Rias Gremory, a crimson-haired beauty who reveals herself as a Devil and part of the Gremory Clan. He finds himself reborn as a Devil with the purpose of serving her.

The story focuses on the ongoing battle between the the Three Super Natural Faction:

  • Devils
  • Fallen Angels
  • Angels

deck: The son of Thanos and an unnamed Inhuman woman. Thane spent the majority of his life in a secret Inhuman city as a healer, until the day his father came to Earth to track him down and kill him.
description:
Origin

In a hidden Inhuman city, Thane was known as The Healer. Thane's true nature was revealed when Black Bolt activated the Terrigen Bomb during his fight with Thanos, leading to wide-spread mutations across Earth. As this happened however, his people were killed in the process due to his powers.

Creation

Thane was created by Jonathan Hickman and Mike Deodato Jr. in New Avengers #10, as part of the Infinity crossover event.

Major Story Arcs

Infinity

After his powers were awakened by the Terrigen Bomb, Thane, who had spent his life healing others, looked in horror as his new power had killed all he knew. He was found by Ebony Maw, who quickly manipulated and trapped Thane, who is the last remaining offspring of Thanos.

As Thanos was finally going to kill his last child, the Avengers arrived on the scene. Ebony Maw continued to talk to Thane about his power and destiny. He released Thane to see if he would save the world, in doing so become his father's son and take life. Thane accepted and put Thanos in a state of 'living death.'

The Black Vortex

He left the Earth with Ebony Maw, still under his manipulation.

Powers & Abilities

Thane's left hand has the ability to instantly change the very economics of existence. He lacks control of his power, thus everyone within a certain radius of him is killed.

Thane's right hand projects an amber construct which traps everyone within a certain radius of him and leaves them in a state of "living death."

Black Vortex Empowerment:

As a result of the cosmic power of the corrupting Black Vortex, Thane's cosmic potential was unleashed, vastly improving on all of his previous abilities and bestowing additional ones. He has used his cosmically enhanced power to encase the entirety of Spartax in his amber construct.

Equipment:

He was given a containment suit by Ebony Maw, which alters his powers so they can only be utilized through direct contact.

Weaknesses:

Unless he has the containment suit by Ebony Maw on, his powers are unstable, which unfortunately results in people getting hurt or killed.

Other Media

Avengers Alliance

As part of the Special Ops assignment, Infinity (13), a character by the name (Modern) Thane teams up with your agent for a Mini-Boss battle in Mission 3 - The Search for Thane.

"The hunt is on for the mysterious Thane. Whoever he is, Thanos wants him... which means we have to do everything in our power to keep Thane out of his hands." - Avengers Alliance

deck:
Koneko Toujou is a petite 15 year old girl attending Kuoh Academy as a First year student. She exhibit a stoic personality which make her appear as though that she has a robot like personality.
She serves in Rias Gremory's peerage as Rook and the one who delivers the most violent punishment to Issei whenever he is acting perverted.
description:
Koneko Toujou is a petite 15 year old girl attending Kuoh Academy as a First year student. She exhibits a stoic personality which makes her appear as though she has a robot like personality.

She serves in Rias Gremory's peerage as Rook and the one who enacts the most violent punishment to Issei whenever he is acting perverted.

Appearance

Human Form

Koneko is a small and petite fifteen year old girl normally seen wearing the Kuoh Academy's Uniform. Contrary to popular belief though small in stature Koneko does not fit the loli stereotype.

She exhibits the following features:

  • Eyes - Golden Hazel Yellow.
  • Hair - Silver in color with length reaching down to her shoulder. Her hair is always adorned by a clip resembling that of a black cat.
  • Breast Size - Issei always say that she is a work in progress often leading to a violent beating.

She is petite in appearance yet in spite of this, she exhibits monster like strength.

When fighting, she wears a pair of gloves with a cat paw print.

Devil/Nekomata Form

Devil Form - no noticeable difference in her human form besides the bat-like wings on her back.

Nekomata Form -In Nekomata Form, she grows two pairs of cat ears and a tail.

Personality

Koneko is introduced as an emotionless character based on her facial expression commonly referred to as a kuudere. This trait gives her a cool personality and makes her seem unfriendly and hard to approach. At first, she is the only member of the Occult Research Club who hated and insulted Issei for his perverted acts. As she begins to warm-up and fall in love with Issei, she starts to show a variety of facial expression befitting a normal individual.

She does not like people calling her a midget, vertically challenged, or flat (with reference to her chest size). There was a time when Koneko snapped because of envy with regard to her team mate's breast size.

Power and Abilities

Super Human Strength

Despite her petite figure, Koneko possesses super human strength which is standard for someone with the rank of Rook. She can easily lift things that are many times her own weight without struggling. Her punches can decimate a building with little effort.

Super Human Durability

Along with her strength, she also posses super human durability as a Rook. She is able to withstand attacks that would normally incapacitate ordinary devils like; such as being hit with attacks imbued with holy properties like a spear of light from a fallen angel.

Issei (Yuuki Kaji) is reincarnated as a devil, and from that day forward, he serves as an underling of Rias Gremory (Yōko Hikasa), a high-level devil who is also the prettiest girl of Kuoh Academy as part of her peerage.

The game has a unique system, the player advances by following his desires. The game's story parts reenact the anime's plot, particularly, Issei's daily school life surrounded by girls. The player engages in conversations with the heroines and improves (or ruins) his standing among them by making choices. According to Famitsu, "the key to winning is 'lust'!"

In each chapter of the game, there are also battles with various opponents. The battles have a typical turn-based system in which the player selects commands. The player can use the "lust power" accumulated in the story parts to increase the "Dress Break" damage against opponents in battle.

He is soon saved by Rias Gremory, a crimson-haired beauty who reveals herself as a Devil and part of the Gremory Clan. He finds himself reborn as a Devil with the purpose of serving her.

deck:
Xenovia is a young woman who appeared with Irina Shidou tasked by the Church to retrieve the missing Excalibur s. One of the natural Holy Sword user, she is entrusted to use the Holy Sword Durandal.

After the Kokabiel incident and learning that God is dead, she joined Rias Gremory's peerage and given the rank of Knight along with Yuuto Kiba.
description:
Xenovia is a young woman who appeared with Irina Shidou tasked by the Church to retrieve the missing Excalibur s. One of the natural Holy Sword user, she is entrusted to use the Holy Sword Durandal.

After the Kokabiel incident and learning that God is dead, she joined Rias Gremory's peerage and given the rank of Knight along with Yuuto Kiba.

Appearance

Xenovia is a young woman around the age of Issei, though at first glance, you can say that she is older. Her hair is short with a highlight of green and the color of her eyes is brown. Her body sculpture though good are less when in comparison to most of the women in the series. Maybe because of her tough and boyish nature.

In her first appearance, she is seen wearing a the church battle uniform which consist of a white cloak and a skin tight outfit.

When she defected to the devil faction she starts wearing the Kuoh Academy Uniform after joining Rias Gremory's peerage and transferring to Kuoh Academy.

Personality

Xenovia has been portrayed in her first appearance to have a very serious personality. She places her mission above anything else. Even when it is known to her that the mission give n to her would later lead to her death, she will accept it willingly.

Xenovia also have the a strong sense of faith to the religion that she serves , like her partner Irina Shidou. But unlike her, she has a sense of flexibility to her like accepting help from other factions.

After she becomes part of Rias' peerage, she develops a close bond with Asia who before she refers to as a witch mainly because of Asia's kindness.

Power and Abilities

Even before turning into a devil, Xenovia already has superhuman capabilities as displayed when she defeated Yuuto Kiba in a mock battle.

Generic Devil Powers

- Her power that came from being turned into a devil.

  • Super Human Strength and Endurance
  • Enhance Senses
  • "Language" - ability to talk with any sentient being.
  • Summoning

She also has, as she said herself, a natural affinity to Holy Swords.

Holy Swords

Excalibur Destruction

Excalibur Destruction is one of the seven swords created from the shattered pieces of the original Excalibur.

This sword also go by the name Holy Sword of Destruction because of its ability to to unleash pure, destructive power that can easily shatter anything it comes into contact with.

Description:

  • a cross in the pommel
  • a grip long enough that can be held with 3 hands (judging from Xenovia's hand position)
  • an axe-like guard
  • a second grip with a chain-like form
  • a long blade that ends with 3 points

Durandal

Durandal is one of the four Holy Swords forged by God. Durandal's power is not easy wield as its power is comparable to a wild horse, just being able to handle it is a feat unto itself.

Xenovia who is said to be compatible to any Holy Sword keeps Durandal in a pocket dimension because even for her, weilding it proves difficult.

Ascalon

Like Durandal, it is a Holy Sword of great power.

The Heroic Oppai Dragon

The Legend of Oppai Dragon and his Lively Companions

Trivia

  • Xenovia's body measurements are B87-W58-H88 cm. (B34-W23-H35 in.) and her height is 166 cm. (5 feet 5 inches), and her weight is 56 kg. (123 lbs.).
  • Xenovia doesn't wear any undergarments when wearing her battle suit.
  • Xenovia' Birthday is February 14.

description: Uncle of (Manhunter) Mark Shaw. During the events in Millennium, he was discovered to be a sleeper agent for The Manhunters.
name: Bradford Shaw

deck: Young mutant with charisma powers.
description:
Santi Sardina is a young male mutant, who's power is to manipulate Charisma, or Acclaim. An involuntary mental suggestion to those around him, Santi receives recognition for any positive enough deed or creation the person is thinking of at the time.

Santi was discovered by David Haller, otherwise known as Legion. Santi was -as described by David- "an awkward loser, uncomfortable in his own skin". When his power first manifested, Santi had accidentally walked into what was a hostage situation between police and what seemed to be a gorilla costumed super-villain. Rather than step up to the occasion and save the woman taken hostage, Santi froze as an amateur hero; Captain Ultra had arrived on the scene and swiftly beat the villain. Rather than thank Captain Ultra, the woman, police officers and bystanders attributed the actions to Santi, praising him as a hero, much to his disbelief.

From this point on his power continued to mark him as a target for success despite having no involvement in the actual matter. This ranged from being praised by the teacher for correct answers (that other students had answered), having cheerleaders cheer him on in football games while he sat in the stands, to even being credited with works such as books or films he had no part of whatsoever. This all became tiring all too soon as he had become tired of all the unwanted attention and affection he felt he had not deserved.

Legion had initially considered manipulating his mind to urge him to become interested in politics and with hope, become the first Mutant President. But thanks to the protest of Blindfold, decided not to and let him choose his own destiny.
name: Santi Sardina

deck: Crime Fighter in Century City
description:
Origin

Originally from Los Angeles and of Egyptian descent, Pyramid came to Century City to fight crime with the Green Hornet. He uses a shield defensively and offensively.
name: Pyramid

deck: Crime Fighter in Century City
description:
Origin

Blamazon was formerly an Olympic athelete participating in the London Olympics. After competing, Blamazon underwent a sex change operation, becoming the woman he alsway felt like on the inside.

Donning the superhero identity of Blamazon, she went to Century City to team up with the Green Hornet.
name: Blamazon

deck: A Crime Fighter in Century City
description:
Origin

Galactic Axe Man claims to be the offspring of Marduk the Wise and Tiamat the Unholy, thus making him a god. His duty is to forge peace between the heavens and the underworld. He has an axe capable of slicing through cars.

He came to Century City to team up with the Green Hornet, but after being offended he attacked and his teammates turned on him as well.
name: Galactic Axe Max

deck: A Crime Fighter in Century City
description:
Origin

Killroy Styx is a brilliant inventor who wears a robotic suit of armor to fight crime. He and some colleagues went to Century City to join forces with the Green Hornet, but Killroy was unimpressed and left, choosing to join up with the Hornet's enemy - Doctor Creepy.
name: Killroy Styx

deck: General in the Tirzan army.
description:
Origin

A faithful soldier, Ortho becomes a general in the Tirzan army.

Creation

Drawn by Howard Larsen.

Major Story Arcs

Ortho sits in at a war council with Tirza, Garth, and Gaddo. He has very little input as, unlike the other two men, he has not yet stepped foot in the rival city of Zarkhana. Once a plan has been agreed upon he leads his soldiers to victory over Zarkhana.
name: Ortho

deck: Ruler of Tirza.
description:
Origin

Queen of the city of Tirza.

Creation

Drawn by Howard Larsen.

Major Story Arcs

Tirza's sister, Shala, rebels and takes over the city of Zarkhana. Shala also takes their brother Gaddo as a prisoner. Gaddo escapes with the help of Garth and Malu and Tirza uses their inside knowledge to conduct a meeting to find some way to overthrow her sister. She agrees on a plan and sends the men and soldiers to complete it. Zarkhana is soon Tirza's again and she gives the rule of it to Garth.
name: Tirza

deck: Brother of good queen Tirza and bad queen Shala.
description:
Origin

Gaddo became a prisoner of Zarkhana when his sister Shala rebelled from Tirza.

Creation

Drawn by Howard Larsen.

Major Story Arcs

Gaddo and the other prisoners are pleased when Garth and Malu drop down into their cell after defeating some guards. Gaddo rallies the prisoners and they revolt when reinforcements arrive. Gaddo leads the prisoners to a secret exit from the city and they are reunited with their loved ones in the city of Tirza.

They do not rest long. Gaddo and Garth plan and execute a scheme to get the Zarkhanian doors open. Gaddo draws the guards away and Garth opens the gate. Once the Tirzan armies are in the city, Gaddo finds and personally arrests his evil sister, restoring Tirza to reign once again over all the people.
name: Gaddo

deck: Ruler of Chicalmo for many years.
description:
Origin

Prophetess of Chicalmo and wielder of the Flame Scepter.

Creation

Drawn by Howard Larsen.

Major Story Arcs

Having ruled for decades, the old goddess learns that a new, prophesied-for goddess has arrived to replace her. She meets the young woman, Shelia Vernow, and willingly hands over the Flame Scepter. She then leaps into a fire to consecrate herself to the gods.
name: The Old Goddess

deck: Guardian of the Chicalmo Flame Temple.
description:
Origin

An old, wizened man in charge of guarding the temple in Chicalmo.

Creation

Drawn by Howard Larsen.

Major Story Arcs

As guardian of the Flame Temple, Petocl grows concerned that the Flame Goddess is getting along in years. Fortunately, a replacement is found, as Shelia Vernow stumbles into the ancient city. He bestows upon Shelia the Flame Scepter and the right to be called the new Flame Goddess. He also instructs her to kill two prisoners, Cliff Barron and Neal Vernow (her lost brother). Petocl watches the sacrificial ceremony in awe, as neither men is able to be killed by Shelia's knife. She is able to convince him that the men are gods and worthy of a banquet.
name: Petocl

deck: Shady Peruvian trail guide.
description:
Origin

A guy in Peru who knows his way around.

Creation

Drawn by Howard Larsen.

Major Story Arcs

Juan hears two things: the tunnel to Chicalmo is being blocked by the Peruvian government and Shelia Vernow is looking for her brother, who most likely passed through that tunnel. He offers his services to her in locating the tunnel before the government can shut it down. He leads her with a group to the tunnel's entrance and then immediately abandons her to whatever fate the other side of the tunnel holds for her.
name: Juan Sinto

deck: Explorer/archeologist.
description:
Origin

Archeologist obsessed with finding the lost city of Chicalmo in Peru.

Creation

Drawn by Howard Larsen.

Major Story Arcs

Having scoured Peru with his partner Neal Vernow, Cliff finally finds Chicalmo. The men are immediately beset by locals and taken captive. They await execution for many days. They are finally taken to the top of a temple. Cliff watches as Neal is stabbed over and over again by the young flame goddess. He is surprised to see that Neal has received no harm. The flame goddess convinces the people that Cliff and Neal must be gods and a feast must be thrown to appease them. They are taken to the flame goddesses room where she reveals that she is Neal's sister Shelia. It is presumed that the three stay in Chicalmo.
name: Cliff Barron

deck: Unlikely ruler of a lost Peruvian people.
description:
Origin

After a bad dream, Shelia gets the feeling that her brother is in trouble. She travels to Peru and finds the lost people of Chicalmo, who make her their new flame goddess.

Creation

Drawn by Howard Larsen.

Major Story Arcs

When alerted that her first order of business as the flame goddess is to sacrifice two recently captured prisoners, Shelia deduces that the men are her brother and his partner. She calls the blacksmith and has him construct a knife with a retractable blade.

The day of the execution arrives and her fears are validated: the men she is supposed to kill are her brother Neal and his friend Cliff Barron. She uses her trick knife. The Chicalmans are shocked that the knife makes no mark on the men. Shelia convinces the people that the men must be gods. They must throw a feast to appease any anger. In her room, she reveals her identity to the two men and it is presumed that they spend the rest of their days in Chicalmo.
name: Shelia Vernow

deck: Explorer/archeologist.
description:
Origin

Archeologist obsessed with finding the lost city of Chicalmo in Peru.

Creation

Drawn by Howard Larsen.

Major Story Arcs

Having scoured Peru with his partner Cliff Barron, Neal finally finds Chicalmo. The men are immediately beset by locals and taken captive. They await execution for many days. They are finally taken to the top of a temple. Cliff watches as Neal is stabbed over and over again by the young flame goddess. Neal is surprised to see that he has received no harm. The flame goddess convinces the people that Neal and Cliff must be gods and a feast must be thrown to appease them. They are taken to the flame goddesses room where she reveals that she is Neal's sister Shelia. It is presumed that the three stay in Chicalmo.
name: Neal Vernow

deck: Zankharan soldier.
description:
Origin

Soldier of the rogue Zanhara nation.

Creation

Drawn by Howard Larsen.

Major Story Arcs

While out on patrol, Kron and his fellow soldiers find Malu and Garth sleeping on the beach. He immediately suspects them of being spies from the rival nation of Tirza and he arrests the two. He brings them before the queen, Shala.

Kron later suspects that Garth, whom the queen has made her guard, is seeking to free Malu. Shala orders Kron to follow Garth. Sure enough, Kron discovers Garth trying to enter Malu's prison. Kron orders his men to arrest Garth and cast him into prison as well.
name: Kron

deck: Evil usurper and queen of Zarkhana.
description:
Origin

Unhappy with her lot in life as the sister of the queen of Tirza (whose name also happens to be Tirza), Shala revolts and takes over the city of Zarkhana, thereby ruling her own people and fighting against her sister. She even takes her own brother, Gaddo, prisoner.

Creation

Drawn by Howard Larsen.

Major Story Arcs

One day, two prisoners are brought before Queen Shala. They are Garth and Malu and they are suspected of being Tirzan spies. Shala makes Malu her slave and promotes Garth as her personal guard. She finds the guard handsome and makes a pass at him. Malu sees and lashes out verbally at the queen. Shala imprisons Malu in the Tower of Indecision. Shala later hears that Garth has shown interest in the tower and she orders a soldier to watch Garth. Garth tries to save Malu but is captured and Shala condemns him to the same fate.

The prisoners eventually escape and lead the Tirzan army against Zarkhana. Shala is arrested by her brother and locked away. Fortunately, Shala knows of secret passages and finds an exit. She finds the Rock of Munda. She pushes it from the castle wall to try and kill Garth and Malu and comes toppling down with it. It is unknown as to whether this fall kills her.
name: Shala

deck: Princess of Neptuna.
description:
Origin

Daughter of King Jarod, ruler of Neptuna. Tais was sent to find help during a war. She fell into a crevasse and was frozen for thousands of years.

Creation

Drawn by Howard Larsen.

Major Story Arcs

Princess Tais awakens after thousands of years of sleep when Dick Kane and Ted Briggs dig her out of ice. She immediately assumes the men are to help her and her kingdom and she leads the men to Neptuna. She pays little attention to their complaints of heavy air. The three find her city completely ruined. Crushed, she agrees to accompany the men above ground to their home. As soon as they hit the fresh air of the surface, Princess Tais falls into a pile of dust.
name: Princess Tais

deck: Explorer/archeologist.
description:
Origin

Archeological partner to Ted Briggs, the men search for the Earth for lost treasures.

Creation

Drawn by Howard Larsen.

Major Story Arcs

While on an expedition in the jungles of the Middle East, Dick and Ted encounter a massive storm. They find refuge in a cave but are soon beset by an earthquake that opens the ground and swallows them. Underground, they find a mound of ice. Inside that ice is a beautiful woman, perfectly preserved. Dick has the brilliant idea of digging her out. Doing so causes her to awaken. She claims to be Princess Tais and leads them further into the cave to help her people win a war. The air becomes thicker and chokes the men. They finally find the princess's home in ruins. They take her to the surface where the air is lighter and they can breathe again. Unfortunately, this air reduces the princess to dust. The men go home.
name: Dick Kane
